alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia; Western Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 9:33AM PST until March 02 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 700 FEET... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia and Western Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County, Greater Vancouver Area and Western Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia; Western Columbia River Gorge
